archimate:BusinessProcess.name: 7/ Any Business PROCESS or "B"
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: This is might be a specialization of a ENTERPRISE PROCESS(3) when defined to represent a business cases (as realized ) by theirs process owner ( Business Roles (8) or by specify actors(9). It realized indirectly also a ENTEPRISE SERVICE THIS made of a process of activities (11) and under controlled (i.e under the same ENTREPRISE FUNCTION) It uses business Events(40) to trigger other business process. The goal a THIS it to deliver a piece of PROCESS RESULT (5) via the planned Entreprise Business Object(10)
